      UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4515.107 Safari/537.36<span class="line"><!---->UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4515.107 Safari/537.36<!----></span><br><br>Steps to reproduce the problem:<span class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></span><br>1. download asan-linux-release-917083.zip and unzip chrome<span class="line"><!---->1. download asan-linux-release-917083.zip and unzip chrome<!----></span><br>2. copy the mojom.js file: `python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/ASAN/gen/` and start a server at floder of poc.html & test.html : `python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8605`<span class="line"><!---->2. copy the mojom.js file: `python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/ASAN/gen/` and start a server at floder of poc.html &amp; test.html : `python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8605`<!----></span><br>3. ./asan-linux-release-917083/chrome  --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist <span class="line"><!---->3. ./asan-linux-release-917083/chrome  --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8605/poc.html<!----></a><br>4. UAF occurs<span class="line"><!---->4. UAF occurs<!----></span><br><br>What is the expected behavior?<span class="line"><!---->What is the expected behavior?<!----></span><br><br>What went wrong?<span class="line"><!---->What went wrong?<!----></span><br>In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] => `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` => `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<span class="line"><!---->In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] =&gt; `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` =&gt; `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<!----></span><br><br>[1]<span class="line"><!---->[1]<!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=142<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=142"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=142<!----></a><br>[2]<span class="line"><!---->[2]<!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=168<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=168"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/ppapi_download_request.cc;l=168<!----></a><br>[3]<span class="line"><!---->[3]<!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;l=712<a class="undefined"         +download_protection owners, can you take a look please? Browser process UaF accessible from a compromised renderer is High severity, but I'm not sure which release this affects.<span class="line"><!---->+download_protection owners, can you take a look please? Browser process UaF accessible from a compromised renderer is High severity, but I'm not sure which release this affects.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

The fix for this is to<span class="line"><!---->checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF.         Ah yes we can. Thank you for confirming in <span class="line"><!---->Ah yes we can. The fix for this is to<span class="line"><!---->checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF. The fix for this is to<!----></span><br>observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<span class="line"><!---->observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>e7d560979f89705ea2844f9f64b5c7a598a03f2b<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

UAF occurs<span class="line"><!---->4. UAF occurs<!----></span><br><br>What is the expected behavior?<span class="line"><!---->What is the expected behavior?<!----></span><br><br>What went wrong?<span class="line"><!---->What went wrong?<!----></span><br>In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] => `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` => `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<span class="line"><!---->In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] =&gt; `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` =&gt; `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<!----></span><br><br>[1]<span         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1"><!---->edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<!----></a><br>Author: Daniel Rubery <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Daniel Rubery &lt;<!----></span>drubery@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/drubery@chromium.org"><!---->drubery@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Sep 28 19:16:15 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Sep 28 19:16:15 2021<!----></span><br><br>[Merge M94] Observe WebContents in PPAPIDownloadRequest<span class="line"><!---->[Merge M94] Observe WebContents in PPAPIDownloadRequest<!----></span><br><br>If the WebContents is destroyed while the PPAPIDownloadRequest is<span class="line"><!---->If the WebContents is destroyed while the PPAPIDownloadRequest is<!----></span><br>checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF. The fix for this is to<span class="line"><!---->checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF. The fix for this is to<!----></span><br>observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<span class="line"><!---->observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products.           Comment 32<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1245578#c32">Comment 32<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">

UAF occurs<span class="line"><!---->4. UAF occurs<!----></span><br><br>What is the expected behavior?<span class="line"><!---->What is the expected behavior?<!----></span><br><br>What went wrong?<span class="line"><!---->What went wrong?<!----></span><br>In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] => `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` => `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<span class="line"><!---->In function PPAPIDownloadRequest::CheckAllowlistsOnIOThread()[1], UIThreadTaskRunner will post a task which will call AllowlistCheckComplete()[2]. AllowlistCheckComplete will then call function like this: `SendRequest`[2] =&gt; `AddReferrerChainToPPAPIClientDownloadRequest` =&gt; `GetNavigationObserverManager`[3].And GetNavigationObserverManager will use `web_contents` without check, if we could delete `web_contents` before the posted taks is called, UAF occurs.<!----></span><br><br>[1]<span The fix for this is to<span class="line"><!---->checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF.         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1"><!---->edbb462a3b0c5f9528cf8d7cb982bb5ddc0b5cc1<!----></a><br>Author: Daniel Rubery <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Daniel Rubery &lt;<!----></span>drubery@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/drubery@chromium.org"><!---->drubery@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Sep 28 19:16:15 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Sep 28 19:16:15 2021<!----></span><br><br>[Merge M94] Observe WebContents in PPAPIDownloadRequest<span class="line"><!---->[Merge M94] Observe WebContents in PPAPIDownloadRequest<!----></span><br><br>If the WebContents is destroyed while the PPAPIDownloadRequest is<span class="line"><!---->If the WebContents is destroyed while the PPAPIDownloadRequest is<!----></span><br>checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF. The fix for this is to<span class="line"><!---->checking the allowlist, we end up with a UaF. The fix for this is to<!----></span><br>observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<span class="line"><!---->observe the WebContents and cancel the request.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products.           Comment 32<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1245578#c32">Comment 32<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">

        for LitElement.

            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
